articles.title: Mediacorp actor Benjamin Tan's mother who had been in a coma dies - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: “I hope I did you proud in this life, I’d want to be your son again in our next lives. Be happy, Mummy.”
articles.content: Mediacorp actor Benjamin Tans mother has died. He shared the news on social media on Saturday (Apr 16): I hope I did you proud in this life, Id want to be your son again in our next lives. Be happy, … [+5 chars]

articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: JDT off to a flyer in ACL 2022; Lion City Sailors get reality check being among Asia's elite - ESPN
articles.description: The AFC Champions League 2022 East Zone began on Friday with Johor Darul Ta'zim off to a flyer, while Lion City Sailors were given a reality check.
articles.content:
The group stage in the AFC Champions League 2022's East Zone got underway on Friday evening and there was immediately plenty of thrills and spills.
From two legitimate contenders sharing the spoils … [+4659 chars]

articles.title: #ACL2022 - Group I | Kawasaki Frontale (JPN) 1 - 1 Ulsan Hyundai FC (KOR) - The AFC Hub
articles.description: Asian heavyweights Kawasaki Frontale and two-time champions Ulsan Hyundai battled to a 1-1 draw in their AFC Champions League™ Group I opener at the Tan Sri ...
